CANDIDATE 		Gabriele Malcangio
PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		UAE – Dubai
QUALIFICATIONS
Degree in “Economy”, Sapienza University of Rome (Italy) 1992 – 1998
Languages
Italian: Native speaker
English: Fluent
Spanish: Fluent
French: Intermediate (Level 6/9, Berlitz Language Centre)
CAREER SUMMARY
March 2015 to date Arkema Functional Additives
Jan 2018 to date
Position: Sales Manager Organic Peroxides in Middle East, Africa and Latin America
Position based in Dubai Office, UAE, reporting to General Manager EMEA
Business travel before Covid 50%
98 customers including BU key account, turnover in 2021: 15M€
November 2019 - Award for market development in Arkema in difficult countries
Award among 170 sales managers
Objectives
Responsibility spread over 3 activities: Sales, Developments and Projects CANDIDATE 		Gabriele Malcangio
PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		UAE – Dubai
QUALIFICATIONS
Degree in “Economy”, Sapienza University of Rome (Italy) 1992 – 1998
Languages
Italian: Native speaker
English: Fluent
Spanish: Fluent
French: Intermediate (Level 6/9, Berlitz Language Centre)
CAREER SUMMARY
March 2015 to date Arkema Functional Additives
Jan 2018 to date
Position: Sales Manager Organic Peroxides in Middle East, Africa and Latin America
Position based in Dubai Office, UAE, reporting to General Manager EMEA
Business travel before Covid 50%
98 customers including BU key account, turnover in 2021: 15M€
November 2019 - Award for market development in Arkema in difficult countries
Award among 170 sales managers
Objectives
Responsibility spread over 3 activities: Sales, Developments and Projects
Sales managers in Middle East, Africa and Latin America for organic peroxides, all applications, all segments
Activities
Commercial:
Responsible for export sales in Middle East, Africa and Latin America from 5 different plants (Germany, 2 plants in Italy, India and Mexico)
Key Accounts Management (Major petrochemical companies i.e. SABIC, QAPCO, ORBIA, SASOL, SIPCHEM, TASNEE)
Management of agents and distribution network
Commercial development Peroxides: follow all new developments, obtain product approvals and reach a reasonable market share at key projects
Commercial development in new areas in Africa
Tender management and contract negotiation
Marketing support to define the regional strategy/business plan
Support Logistics Department for supply chain definition
Coordinate risk management to respond geopolitical changes
Transversal management with Business, R&D and plants
Establish business plan in the regions
R&D:
Coordinate internal support for customers of the regions (R&D, Marketing, Technical support, process, Safety)
Coordinate all the products approvals
Logistic:
Implement the logistic set up in difficult areas
Solve the local administrative issues with customs, ports, etc
Projects:
Define logistic storage project in Saudi Arabia
Safety Trainings:
Safety training focused on Organic Peroxides to:
big accounts
port operators in KSA, RSA, Colombia, Qatar
sales managers
commercial assistants
More than 50 hours x year of safety trainings provided
Mar 2015 to Dec 2017
Position: Market Manager and Sales Manager Organic Peroxides in Spain, Portugal, South Africa and Latin America
Position based at Arkema plant in Anagni (FR) - Italy
Business travel >50%
50 customers including BU key account, Sales of about 20 M€ in the area
Objectives
Responsibility spread over 3 activities: Marketing, Sales and Developments
Market Manager for a particular Organic Peroxide (Benzoyl Peroxide Paste)
Sales managers in Spain, Portugal and Latin America for organic peroxides, all applications, all segments
Activities
Commercial:
Responsible for export sales from 3 different plants (Germany, 2 plants in Italy)
Key Accounts Management like ORBIA (ex MEXICHEM)
Management of agents and distribution network
Commercial development Peroxides: follow all new developments, obtain product approvals and reach a reasonable market share at key projects
Commercial development in new areas in Africa
Tender management and contract negotiation
Marketing Strategy:
Marketing support to define the strategy/business plan
Develop, propose and deliver Product Strategies (portfolio rationalisation, new product launch,
service definition, market intelligence)
Contribution to the Global Strategy in collaboration with other regional managers
Contribute to the communication: web, trade shows, brochures
2000 to 2015 Oxido srl
Position: Sales Manager in Italy and Spain, HR Manager, Safety Responsible
Position based at Oxido Srl plant in Anagni (FR) - Italy
Business travel >20%
100 customers, Sales of about 8 M€
Objectives
Sales manager in Italian and Spanish market
HR management of 45 people
HSE management for 15 year
Activities
Commercial:
Key Accounts Management like DAYCO
Direct management of final customers
HSE:
Fire Prevention Certificate implementation
Security Management System for Seveso Law
Security and Labor Management System for OHSAS 18001
REACH Regulation management
Periodi

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
